question: Who was appointed as the next Ambassador of India to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea?
explanation: Atul M. Gotsurve was appointed the next Ambassador of India to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Atul M. Gotsurve is an Indian Foreign Service (IFS) Officer of 2004 batch. At present, he is Director in the Ministry of External Affairs. He has been named the next Ambassador of India to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. He will take up this assignment soon.
